title: AndroidJB4VMware9 android 4.4.rc2 prebuilt for vmware 9+
description:
AndroidJB4VMware9 android 4.4.rc2 prebuilt for vmware 9+

this is actually KitKat 4.4 not JB (jelly Bean) I got mixed up with the naming heh

run android on your PC or (mac? not tested) works on my HP Probook
I setup a 1.5gb boot partition and 500mb 2nd partition just incase need
extra space

note! you need vmware 9 or vmplayer 9 or higher to run it.. but might work
on vm8? im sure you can find a torrent with that windows soft..
or if Mac user I think you need their Fusion to load it.

virtual Android is here. I prebuilt a vm snapshot with some apps ready to test it.

has full sound and graphics seems to work on some slots games
and youtube

Esc is back key.. but has virtual soft buttons like phone as well

just download and unrar the folder any where

then drag the vmx file to a running vmware 9 windows to add it to the side

and click it.. click OK to missing USB sticks and say moved it if asks

it should load from the boot loader and have a basic desktop with some apps on it and google search appear and the green background..

originally installed to A: drive a partition on my solid state drive

and a folder called virtual-drives

and under that AndroidJB2015

ENjoy and let me know how you get on
